title: Coloplast Finance B.V. - Post-stabilisation Period Announcement - Yahoo Finance
content: Coloplast Finance B.V. - Post-stabilisation Period Announcement  Yahoo Finance
description: 12 May 2022 Not for distribution, directly or indirectly, in or into the United States or any jurisdiction in which such distribution would be unlawful. Coloplast Finance B.V. Post-stabilisation Period Announcement Further to the pre-stabilisation period announcement dated 11 May 2022, Danske Bank A/S (contact: Syndicate- Morten Grove; telephone: +45 45 14 70 33) hereby gives notice that no stabilisation (within the meaning of Article 3.2(d) of the Market Abuse Regulation (EU/596/2014) was under
